name: Froggo (itch) (Michael Wolf, AlexisPinedo, Jonch_Baklava)
description:
The Story

Froggo is a 2D Sliding platformer where you play as Froggo the Frog on a quest to return home. Froggo slips and slides around, and moves faster the WETTER he is. While out of the water, Froggo will dry out over time - slowing him down, and eventually stopping him altogether. Our amphibious friend needs to stay wet by splashing in puddles and swimming in bodies of water. However, if he gets too wet, he’ll drown.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse (⌨️🖱️)

Walk W,A,S,D  or Arrow KeysJumpSpace
Slide
Shift
PauseEscape About the Project

Our goal with Froggo was to create a light-hearted and engaging side-scroller, where you can play as an adorable frog and save tadpoles.

This project is a Global Game Jam 2022 submission for our small community discord server,  "McSingles".  After the jam, we hope to develop it further!
